    • assignRemainderSeats

      public void assignRemainderSeats(int partyIndex, boolean check)
      Assign the rest of the seats, check if there was a tie and break it, otherwise
      Parameters:
      partyIndex - refers to the index of the party that needs to be checked if there was an equal remainder
      check - check indicates there was an equality of remainders
